Description:
Meet Kavish Devar, the high school student who reverse-engineered Apple AirPods to bring Pro features to Android. Project LibrePods enables ear detection, head gestures, and conversational awareness on rooted devices. See how he built it during Hack Club's High Seas while acing his exams.

#Airpods #LibrePods #Apple

Title: How to get AirPods Pro features on Android (LibrePods)
Author: GitHub
